blogPost.excerpt: Startups on Product Hunt get $10,000 in credits on Freshworks products! Boost your startup journey with leading customer and employee engagement solutions from Freshworks including CRM, live chat, support, ITSM, and HRMS.
blogPost.body: Startups on Product Hunt get $10,000 in credits on Freshworks products! Boost your startup journey with leading customer and employee engagement solutions from Freshworks including CRM, live chat, support, ITSM, and HRMS.
blogPost.title: Freshworks for Startups - Get $10,000 credits on Freshworks Products for your startup
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 产品猎头上的初创企业可获得Freshworks产品的10000美元信用额度! 通过Freshworks领先的客户和员工参与解决方案，包括CRM、即时聊天、支持、ITSM和HRMS，提升您的创业之旅。
localize.tagline: 在Freshworks产品上获得10,000美元的信用额度，供您的创业公司使用。

localize.description: 產品獵頭上的初創企業可獲得Freshworks產品的10000美元信用額度! 通過Freshworks領先的客戶和員工參與解決方案，包括CRM、即時聊天、支持、ITSM和HRMS，提升您的創業之旅。
localize.tagline: 在Freshworks產品上獲得10,000美元的信用額度，供您的創業公司使用。

previous.excerpt: Nacapi creates a well documented API from any kind of JSON: - Paste your JSON file on the console - Create your unique API - GET, POST, PUT, DELETE http methods are supported - Perform operations: random, filtering, limit, sorting (and more coming soon)
previous.title: Nacapi - Turn your JSON into a restful API

localize.description: Nacapi从任何类型的JSON中创建了一个记录良好的API： - 在控制台粘贴你的JSON文件 - 创建你独特的API - 支持GET，POST，PUT，DELETE http方法 - 执行操作：随机，过滤，限制，排序（以及更多即将到来的）。
localize.tagline: 把你的JSON变成一个休息的API

localize.description: Nacapi從任何類型的JSON中創建了一個記錄良好的API： - 在控制檯粘貼你的JSON文件 - 創建你獨特的API - 支持GET，POST，PUT，DELETE http方法 - 執行操作：隨機，過濾，限制，排序（以及更多即將到來的）。
localize.tagline: 把你的JSON變成一個休息的API

next.excerpt: Formst is a JavaScript library for structuring and validating forms in React. It is based on MobX-State-Tree which makes it simple and performant and it is built on the principles of "UI as an afterthought".
next.title: Formst - Model-driven form library for React

localize.description: Formst是一个用于在React中构建和验证表单的JavaScript库。它基于MobX-St-state-Tree，使得它简单且性能良好，它是建立在 "UI作为事后考虑 "的原则上。
Formst是一個用於在React中構建和驗證表單的JavaScript庫。它基於MobX-St-state-Tree，使得它簡單且性能良好，它是建立在 "UI作爲事後考慮 "的原則上。
